original_text: And as he entered a village, he was met by ten lepers, who stood at a distance
korean_text: 한 마을에 들어가시니 나병환자 열 명이 예수를 만나 멀리 서서

sentences.original_text: And as he entered a village,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 한 마을에 들어갔을 때,

sentences.original_text: he was met by ten lepers,
